quote: Being together came close to destroying both of us once already,"" he says. ""But I don't fucking care. You are the memory that gets me through my days, and the fantasy that saves me in the night.
quote_letters: BEING TOGETHER CAME CLOSE TO DESTROYING BOTH OF US ONCE ALREADY HE SAYS BUT I DONT FUCKING CARE YOU ARE THE MEMORY THAT GETS ME THROUGH MY DAYS AND THE FANTASY THAT SAVES ME IN THE NIGHT
